document_data.caption: A map showing the Ammathvale in Luiren.
document_data.name: Ammathvale
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ammathvale''' was a small open valley separating the [[Lluirwood]] in the north from the [[Southern Lluirwood]] in [[Luiren]].
document_data.Geography: This region stretched west to east between the [[Trader's Way]] and the city of [[Ammathluir]] spanning roughly {{SI|100|mi|long=yes}}. An unnamed road branched off from the Trader's Way to pass through the Ammathvale, connecting the rest of the cities of Luiren.
